title: SOLD: c1900 Team Cabinet Photo of 1879 Albany BB Club w/Ned Hanlon (HOF)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: c1900 Team Cabinet Photo of 1879 Albany BB Club w/Ned Hanlon (HOF)
posts.post_content:
Good Morning, Collectors:

Up for sale today is an extremely rare team cabinet photo produced around 1900 from the original team photo and picturing the 1879 Albany Baseball Club, featuring one of the earliest known images of Hall of Famer, Ned Hanlon. Please review scans of the front and back of the item for condition details and please note that Hanlon's name on the back, while in period ink and handwriting style, is not his own autograph. Although they are hard to see in the scan, all players names are pre-printed on the bottom of the photo (Hanlon is on far right). Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
